bill.summary: 3/23/1988--Introduced. Establishes the National Commission on Rural Development to: (1) study the Department of Agriculture's rural development programs; and (2) report to the Secretary of Agriculture and the appropriate congressional committees. Terminates the Commission 30 days after submission of its final report.
